      • getCharset

        @Nullable
public Charset getCharset()
        Returns:
        The default charset used for building. null means system default.

      • setCharset

        @Nonnull
public JCMWriter setCharset(@Nullable
                                      Charset aCharset)
        Set the charset to be used for emitting files.
        Parameters:
        aCharset - The charset to be used. May be null to indicate the use of the system default.
        Returns:
        this for chaining

      • getNewLine

        @Nonnull
public String getNewLine()
        Returns:
        The newline string to be used. Defaults to system default

public JCMWriter setNewLine(@Nonnull

        Set the new line string to be used for emitting source files.
        Parameters:
        sNewLine - The new line string to be used. May neither be null nor empty.
        Returns:
        this for chaining

      • build

        public void build(@Nonnull
                  File aDestDir,
                  @Nullable
                  ProgressCodeWriter.IProgressTracker aStatusPT)
           throws IOException
        Generates Java source code. A convenience method for build(destDir,destDir,status).
        Parameters:
        aDestDir - source files and resources are generated into this directory.
        aStatusPT - if non-null, progress indication will be sent to this stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - on IO error

      • build

        public void build(@Nonnull
                  File aSrcDir,
                  @Nonnull
                  File aResourceDir,
                  @Nullable
                  ProgressCodeWriter.IProgressTracker aStatusPT)
           throws IOException
        Generates Java source code. A convenience method that calls build(AbstractCodeWriter,AbstractCodeWriter).
        Parameters:
        aSrcDir - Java source files are generated into this directory.
        aResourceDir - Other resource files are generated into this directory.
        aStatusPT - Progress tracker. May be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - on IO error if non-null, progress indication will be sent to this stream.
